Though heâ€™s responsible for leading and fostering our talented development team, Jeff is a coder at heart and dynamic languages are his passion. Jeff is a Tcl/Tk core maintainer and co-author of â€œPractical Programming in Tcl and Tkâ€ and regularly publishes papers on the topic. Jeff works closely with ActiveState customers including Cisco, Boeing, Synopsys, NASA and Intel to deliver the best dynamic languages solutions for their development projects.
